mascot-message: Manage your agent's configuration and knowledge base.

stats.total-content-description: All the content produced by the agent.
stats.total-words-description: Cumulative words written across all content.
stats.drafts-description: Number of drafts the agent has saved.
stats.published-description: Number of published pieces produced by the agent.
stats.avg-quality-score-description: Average quality score across generated content.
stats.total-ideas-description: Total ideas generated by the agent.

knowledge-base.title: Brand Knowledge
knowledge-base.description: Files generated using your website url

empty-state.title: No brand files yet
empty-state.description: Upload Markdown files with your brand's values, voice, or guidelines.

quick-actions.title: Quick Actions
quick-actions.description: Perform common tasks related to the agent.

manage-photo.title: Manage Agent Photo
manage-photo.description: Upload a new profile photo for your agent. The image will be displayed in your agent's profile.

messages.file-size-limit: File size must be less than 5MB

file-viewer.description: View the content of the selected file.

messages.generation-error: An error occurred while generating brand files.

delete-all-files.message: This will permanently delete all {{count}} uploaded files for this agent, including documents, knowledge base entries, and file processing data. This action cannot be undone.
